pkgmetadata.longdescription: ipranges - README================================================================================.. warning:: Although production code is based on this library, it should still be considered as work in progress.Introduction--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Python 2 and 3 compatible library for working with IPv4 and IPv6 addressess inmany notations (sible IP, CIDR, range).This README file is work in progress, sorry about that.Copyright--------------------------------------------------------------------------------| Copyright (c) since 2016, CESNET, z. s. p. o.| Author: Pavel KÃ¡cha <pavel.kacha@cesnet.cz>| Use of this package is governed by the ISC license, see LICENSE file.|Changelog--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Version 0.1.12^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^Released 2022-11-02- Allowed adding files from previous versions using Gitlab CI/CD.Version 0.1.11^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^Released 2022-06-27- Added a config file for GitLab CI/CD.- Updated the repository information.- Updated packages versions.
